alert.note: Alert for Inland New Hanover (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued August 14 at 11:57PM EDT until August 15 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Along the banks of the lower Cape Fear River from Wilmington southward. * WHEN...Until 3 AM EDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Portions of Battleship Road and USS North Carolina Road observe minor coastal flooding up to one half foot in depth. In downtown Wilmington, a block of Water Street observes minor flooding up to one quarter foot in depth. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Cape Fear River at Wilmington MLLW Categories - Minor 5.5 ft, Moderate 6.8 ft, Major 10.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 0.8 ft, Moderate 2.1 ft, Major 5.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 15/01 AM 5.8 1.1 0.9 N/A Minor 15/01 PM 5.4 0.7 0.8 N/A None 16/02 AM 5.5 0.8 0.8 N/A Minor 16/02 PM 5.4 0.7 0.8 N/A None 17/02 AM 5.4 0.7 0.9 N/A None 17/03 PM 5.3 0.6 0.8 N/A None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
